articles.title: How to Improve your Mindset
articles.description: “New metaphors are capable of creating new understandings and, therefore, new realities.” – Lakoff, George; Johnson, Mark. Metaphors We Live By How many times…
articles.notes: Changing the metaphors and metnal models you use to coneive the world is similar to changing environmental incentives, it encourages different behaviors. Thus it may be a more effective way of changing your habits.
